name: Jungle Noir
description:
Please Note: All donations for my games go directly to support the Technology Cooperative, a 501c3 nonprofit organization founded to create a technology-focused community that provides computer-related technology access and awareness.

This game was created in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare #29 under the theme "beneath the surface", and this is where the idea for the noir setting came from.

The game was made by myself and my two oldest daughters (we entered the game jam as a team). All of the artwork is by my daughters and the voice acting is done by all three of us plus a special guest performance by my wife.

If you would like to read more about the game's development, I've written a postmortem on my blog.
